"A.P.241/3/22/11:00": "At 『A.P.238/2/20』, You were enlisted, as ARKS, to complete a mission on planet Naberius."
"As you completed numerous missions, you quickly gained recognition within ARKS, and many adventures unfolded before you."
"Darkers, Dark Falz... And the main leader, the [Profound Darkness]. The whole fight has been a success!"
"Looking back now, it's still amazing. At the moment, that person is right in front of me! Ah, forgive me. I went off topic."
"At the moment, it's been 2 years since the resurrection of the [Profound Darkness]."
"I don't blame you for being surprised, <%me>. For you, it all went by in an instant!"
"After your fight with the Profound Darkness, you entered Cold Sleep in order to purify all the Darker elements."
"During that time, we were still fighting Profound Darkness. But don't worry! Both ARKS and the universe are still alive!"
"And now, <%me>'s grand return! Now all ARKS are perfect to go!"
"...I wish. But life's not perfect. That's just how the world is."
"I know that you just finished your purification, but I woke you up because I have a favor to ask of you."
"...Oh, before we get to that, I actually need to give you this!"
"This, <%me>, is made to weave together your adventures into a grand chronicle! I call it a \"Story Board!\""
"With this, you'll always keep moving. Let's get used to it!"
